author: awhite
msg: Change default return value of AbstractVersionStrategy.checkVersion to
something that will force an update on refresh, but won't result in an
optimistic exception on flush.  This is a more appropriate default for
derived strategies that don't override cehckVersion (currently only the

author: stack
msg: HBASE-648 If mapfile index is empty, run repair

author: rpluem
msg: * Introduce apr_brigade_split_ex. apr_brigade_split_ex allows to reuse
an already existing brigade instead of creating a new one. Thus it
can be used to lower the memory footprint where brigades need to be
split many times during the lifetime of a pool.

author: niq
msg: Introduce variable interpolation in reverse proxy configuration
